package.name: marble_hd2_sensor_config_3
package.description: The marble_hd2_sensor_config_3 track vehicle package - Has two rgbd camera Realsense D435 - An RP Lidar S1 - OS1-64 3D Laser C - IMU - gas sensor - A pan/tilt gimbal (Trossen Dynamixel MX-64) with a Realsense D435 and 100 W laser mounted on it - A planar lidar (RPLidar S1) - A microstrain 3DMGX5-25 IMU (AHRS) - Vividia HTI-301 LWIR Camera (thermal camera) - Weight: about 75 lbs
package.author: Derek Vasquez
Neil Johnson
Hector Escobar
